Serdel was a soldier of Dawnfire during the Dawn Age around the year .
He was grizzled and stocky.
He was a man-at-arms.
Serdel was a soldier of Dawnfire, serving under King Orchtrien as a second-in-command under Rhespen Ash.
Serdel served under Rhespen Ash during a winter incursion in , in which the elven commander was sent to raid territories of neighboring green dragons by the gold dragon king Orchtrien. One night in the incursion, Serdel was among the troops with Rhespen when a green dragon attacked the elfs forces. Rhespens magic and planning allowed them to kill the dragon Serdel congratulated his commander as a dragonslayer after the fact.
